structure.unit: Chapter 11C DEVELOPMENT WITHIN FLOOD HAZARD DISTRICTS

text.section:
Sec. 11C-13. Warning and disclaimer of liability.
The degree of flood protection required herein is considered reasonable for regulatory purposes and is based on scientific studies. Larger floods may occur. This chapter shall not be deemed to imply that areas inside or outside designated flood hazard areas will be entirely free from flooding or flood damages, and shall not create liability on the part of Miami-Dade County or any officer or employee thereof for any flood damages that result from reliance on this chapter or any administrative decision lawfully made thereunder.
